categories: Category:Battles of the pre-Shadow Hand campaign

nodes.text: A battle occurred in the Bilbringi system in 10 ABY, during the offensive prior to Operation Shadow Hand. This battle took part of the offensive planned by reborn Emperor Palpatine against the New Republic to reconquer the Core Worlds. Those assaults were executed by the reunified Imperial warlords and loyal Imperial forces prior to the launch of Operation Shadow Hand. Grand Moff Ardus Kaine was charged to reconquer the Northern Dependencies, including the northern part of the Core.
